snippet: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann must now plan how to approach a slate of international tournaments that will allow new players to shine, and will also work on developing his players’ assertiveness.
abstract: World Cup Roundup; United States men's soccer coach Jurgen Klinsmann, with 2014 World Cup out of the way, must now plan how to approach a slate of international tournaments that will allow new generation of players to shine; other World Cup soccer news noted.

byline.original: By ANDREW KEH and BILL CARTER

lead_paragraph: Coach Jurgen Klinsmann must now plan how to approach a slate of international tournaments that will allow new players to shine, and will also work on developing his players’ assertiveness.

headline.seo: World Cup 2014: Jurgen Klinsmann Plans for the United States’ Next Step
headline.main: After Its Exit, U.S. Identifies Opportunities for Its Future
headline.print_headline: After Its Exit, U.S. Identifies Opportunities for Its Future

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations
